  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x40

        text run at (0,0) width 738: "The following text is in a caption element whose style is set to display:table-caption. The element is not inside a table."
    LayoutText {#text} at (738,0) size 4x19
      text run at (738,0) width 4: " "

        text run at (0,20) width 103: "caption element."

      text run at (103,20) width 4: " "

        text run at (107,20) width 549: "If there's no red text between this text and the previous text the caption is not displayed."
